markdownRemark.html:
I have not had a Privacy Policy on my web site until today. I recently decided to turn on web logging for my web site, and decided to add a privacy policy.

My privacy policy can be read at the this url. I am also using P3P on this site now as well. I encourage any web developers who are not familiar with P3P to read about it at the W3C site.
